instructions: Open your Pixel phone's "Settings" app . Tap Connected devices . Tap the toggle next to Bluetooth to turn it on.

Open your Pixel phone's "Settings" app . Tap Apps & notifications and then All apps . Find Google Play services and tap to open. Tap App notifications . Check that app notifications are "On." If not, tap the toggle to enable.
Open your Pixel phone's "Settings" app . Tap Connected devices . Tap the toggle next to Bluetooth to turn it off. Tap it again to turn it back on.
